top_insights.title: Paradox of Mobile Money Growth vs Account Ownership
top_insights.implication: Focus on active usage, not registration

top_insights.title: Infrastructure Drives Access
top_insights.evidence: Agent density shows 0.72 correlation with ownership

top_insights.title: Gender Gap Persists but Improving
top_insights.evidence: 14pp gender gap in account ownership (down from 16pp)
top_insights.implication: Targeted interventions still needed for women

top_insights.title: Event Timing Matters
top_insights.evidence: Telebirr launch had stronger impact than M-Pesa entry
top_insights.implication: First-mover advantage significant in digital finance

top_insights.title: Active Usage Lags Registration
top_insights.implication: Activation strategies critical for real inclusion

key_questions.Why 2021-2024 slowdown?: Duplicate accounts, population growth, data differences
key_questions.Data limitations?: Missing infrastructure data (2015-2020), limited regional disaggregation
key_questions.Hypotheses for Task 3?: Agent expansion → access, digital literacy → usage, events drive adoption

data_limitations: Sparse temporal coverage for some indicators
Event impact data needs more granularity
recommendations: Focus on agent network expansion for access
Track active vs registered users separately
Use event studies for impact evaluation
